item.title: Introduction
item.description: Get started There are two main ways to get started with Doks: Tutorial üëâ The Tutorial is intended for novice to intermediate users. Step-by-step instructions on how to start a new Doks project. Tutorial ‚Üí Quick Start üëâ The Quick Start is intended for intermediate to advanced users. One page summary of how to start a new Doks project. Quick Start ‚Üí Go further Recipes, Reference Guides, Extensions, and Showcase.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Requirements Doks uses npm to centralize dependency management, making it resources, build tooling, plugins, and build scripts: Download and install Node.js (it includes npm) for your platform. Start a new Doks project Create a new site, change directories, install dependencies, and start development server. Create a new site Doks is available as a child theme, and a starter theme: Use the Doks child theme, if you do not plan to customize a lot, and/or need future Doks updates.

item.title: Commands
item.description: üí° Popsicle main prefix is `` ‚òëÔ∏è We are currently working on more commands for Popsicle. To get a users ID, you must enable developer mode. If you have already enabled this, you can ignore this. For Android users, go to User Settings > App Settings > Behavior and turn on Developer Mode. For iOS, go to User Settings > Appearance > Advanced and turn on Developer Mode.
